Syracuse mens basketball coach Jim Boeheim said Penn State will never be competitive in the Big Ten but Illinois coach Lou Henson thinks the Lions could hold their own with Indiana and Michigan State right now PERIOD

Penn State  defeated the Fighting Illini  last night in Rec Hall and Henson whose team fell to  was thoroughly impressed PERIOD

 he said PERIOD They might go higher than that its hard to say PERIOD Penn State ranks up there very well I think.Its hard for me to tell where Penn State would rate in the Big TenIf Illinois is a middle division Big Ten team thats a heck of a league PERIOD Playing one or two games is one thing but playing nightin nightout is another thing.Its going to be very difficult for Bruce if that happensThat could really damage the program.I really see no reason why we cant be integratedBasketball isnt scheduled that far in advance.Ill guarantee you that we could work them in very easily PERIOD It should be done PERIOD Theres no sense in hanging a school out to dry for three or four years.At an institution of the caliber of Penn State theres no reason why there isnt a new arenaThe basketball program needs that PERIOD It should come about PERIOD But whether the arena is there or not doesnt matter.I think if you talk to anyone on our team we could really care less about the Big TenThats next year were just worried about being in the Atlantic  now.We just have to wait and see if the powers that be can get it doneTo tell you the truth Im really tired of it. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD
